entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
